name: balance_sheet
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Returns complete balance sheet of a company showing the summary of assets, liabilities, and shareholdersâ€™ equity.

Availability: Ultra plan
Data weighting: 100 API credits per symbol

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company.

exchange.description: The stock exchange where the company is listed.

country.description: The country where the company is located.

start_date.description: The start date for the balance sheet data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

end_date.description: The end date for the balance sheet data in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

period.description: The reporting period of the balance sheet data. Defaults to 'annual'.
